websites.name: Alachua County Commission
websites.description: Find the meetings, see who represents each district, find contact information and a map of the districts.

websites.name: Sheriff's Office
websites.description: Alachua County Sheriff's Office website for law enforcement services and public safety information.

websites.name: County Jail
websites.description: Find inmates in the Alachua County jail. The site allows you to learn an inmates age, sex, race, their pod and when they were booked.

websites.name: Property Appraiser
websites.description: Find the owner of a house by typing in the address. You can also find the amount of properties a person or comapany owns and where.
